MIRACLE_PLAN_LIST
------------------------
1| Have enough money to permanently reclaim my 27% (40 hr work week) time within the next 7 months.
2| Be lucky in two-way love with the girl within the next 12 months.
3| Have the energy and money necessary to choose what I wish to do from a pool of anything before 2 Nov 2015.
4|  TCCS make a large, positive impact on quality of testing by the end of this year.
